basics.parking: One on-site spot per unit; overflow street parking nearby.
basics.pets: Small, well-behaved pets with prior approval and a cleaning fee.

faqs.a: Yes—fast Wi-Fi. The details are in your arrival email and posted in the unit.
One on-site spot per unit; overflow street parking nearby.
Check-in is 4:00 PM. Early check-in may be possible depending on availability.
Check-out is 11:00 AM. Late check-out may be possible depending on availability.
